name: Spicy Chicken Wings V2
description: An alternative take on the original spicy chicken wing recipe. Barbecued spicy chicken wings, great to have with other things to create a main meal.
keywords: Spicy Chicken Wings, Chicken Wings, Wings, BBQ, Grilled, Spicy, American Cuisine, Appetizer, Snack, Party Food, Chicken, Cumin, Paprika, Cayenne, Garlic

recipeInstructions.name: Prep Wings
recipeInstructions.text: Mix all ingredients together in a large container ensuring the wings are evenly coated in the spice mix. Refrigerate for 1-6 hours.

recipeInstructions.name: Cook Wings
recipeInstructions.text: Cook on a low heat BBQ (roughly 150Â°C) for about 45 minutes or until cooked through. Turning roughly every 5-10 minutes

notes: A simple alternative to the original spicy chicken wing recipe. You can mix and match spices to make a mix the way you want. Add some cumin here, remove some paprika there, etc etc. Once you get comfortable making them its nice to try adding new things.
If you aren't great with chili, just remove a bit of the cayenne, still great!
